ValidationRule.description: Require Distributor when Reseller's Partner Number is blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(Auto_Renewal_Eligible_Core__c = FALSE, OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Order in Process'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won')), ISPICKVAL(Business_Group__c, 'Core'), Distributor__c = NULL, Reseller__c <> NULL, ISPICKVAL(Reseller__r.Partner_Level__c, 'Affiliate'), ISBLANK(Reseller__r.Partner_Number__c), NOT( ISNEW() ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Affiliate partners without a valid partner number are required to purchase through a distributor. Please add a distributor to your opportunity and update your quote.
